addon.name: Annual Hosting & Maintenance
addon.description: If we take care of hosting and maintaining databases, we charge additionally per year.

faq.question: Do I own the code?
faq.answer: Yes! For both WordPress and custom-code projects, you own all the source code and content. We provide full transparency and handover documentation.

faq.question: What's included in the Annual Add-On?
faq.answer: The Annual Hosting & Maintenance package includes cloud hosting, SSL certificates, daily backups, security monitoring, database maintenance, minor content updates, and priority support. Perfect if you want us to handle all technical operations.

faq.question: Can I migrate my existing site?
faq.answer: Absolutely! We can migrate your existing WordPress or custom site to our platform, optimize it, and handle all hosting and maintenance going forward.

faq.question: How long does a project take?
faq.answer: Starter packages typically take 2-3 weeks, Business packages 4-6 weeks, and Scale projects 8-12 weeks depending on complexity. We'll provide a detailed timeline during discovery.
